name: VBoxTrinket

screenshots.caption: Showing the Name in Services Manager

short_description:
Tray and Service work together to Gracefully Start/Shutdown your VM's. 

This software creates headless(No GUI) instances of your Virtual Disks specially useful when those VM's are used as servers. Or maybe just want it to start/shutdown by itself when installed in a remote server. 
The only thing you need to do is enter the VirtualMachine Name exactly how its spelled in the Virtual Box Manager into the Tray App and thats it. This software will automagically start/stop your Virtual Machine gracefully.


Please be advised: 
The Tray app sucessfully Gracefully startsup and powersoff the VM's in the list in the TrayApp. However if the user shuts down while the Service is still running, then the VM's go into an Aborted state. To avoid this use the tray app to easily stop the service to poweroff the vms.
If at any point the user just shutdowns the system, the service will be able start up the VM's in the list at startup regardless.
summary: TrayApp/Service work together to Gracefully manage your VirtualBox VMs
